CodeInjector.BodyTopTitle: Add code at the top of body tag in all pages
CodeInjector.BodyTopDescription: This code will be executed on all pages. Be careful, bad usage can break your instance.
CodeInjector.BodyBottomTitle: Add code at the bottom of body tag in all pages
CodeInjector.BodyBottomDescription: This code will be executed on all pages. Be careful, bad usage can break your instance.
